chunks.zh: Mac 真的没有游戏能玩吗🥺
chunks.en: Are there really no games to play on Mac 🥺

chunks.zh: 过年回家只带了 MacBook Air 回来，还没带鼠标，还能有什么娱乐活动，已经看了两天电视剧了🤣
chunks.en: I only brought my MacBook Air back home for the New Year and didn't bring a mouse. What other entertainment activities are there? I've been watching TV dramas for two days 🤣

chunks.zh: 我知道有个游戏太适合了，不用鼠标，不用高配置，轻松娱乐，步骤如下：1. 下载安装 Microsoft Edge2. 打开 Edge ，在地址栏输入 edge://surf 并回车3. 畅玩吧
chunks.en: I know a game that's perfect for you, no mouse needed, no high configuration, easy entertainment. Steps are as follows: 1. Download and install Microsoft Edge 2. Open Edge, enter edge://surf in the address bar and press Enter 3. Enjoy!

chunks.zh: 可以虚拟个 ARM 版 Windows ，玩很多游戏的。我记得前段时间不是还出了个迁移工具吗？那玩意好像也能跑挺多 Windows 游戏的
chunks.en: You can virtualize an ARM version of Windows and play many games. I remember there was a migration tool released not long ago? That thing seems to be able to run quite a few Windows games too.

chunks.zh: 可以试试装个 crossover 或 whisky ，steam 的游戏基本能玩
chunks.en: You can try installing Crossover or Whisky, and most Steam games should be playable.

chunks.zh: @zhangky 好好好，真没想到 Mac 还能 steam （
chunks.en: @zhangky Great, I really didn't expect Mac to be able to run Steam (
Games made with Unity3D can all be played.

chunks.zh: lol 台服、博德之门   还有 mc
chunks.en: LOL (Taiwan server), Baldur's Gate, and also MC

chunks.zh: 除了射击游戏，Macos 能装上用触控板都能玩呀，目前在玩潜水员戴夫，文明 6
chunks.en: Except for shooting games, you can play games on MacOS with the trackpad. I'm currently playing Dave the Diver and Civilization 6.

chunks.zh: 文明 6 开一局能玩好久了
chunks.en: You can play Civilization 6 for a long time in one game.
